amount.moreThanZero: Amount must be more than zero
amount.totalValueMustBeOverSize: Total order value must be more than {{size}}

price.moreThanZero: Price must be more than zero
price.priceAboveTriggerPrice: Limit price must be above the trigger price
price.priceBelowTriggerPrice: Limit price must be below the trigger price

triggerPrice.moreThanZero: Trigger Price must be more than zero
triggerPrice.cannotBeLessThanSize: Trigger Price cannot be less than {{size}}
triggerPrice.priceAboveMarkPrice: Trigger Price must be higher than {{markPrice}}
triggerPrice.priceBelowMarkPrice: Trigger Price must be lower than {{markPrice}}

orderSize.reduce_size_invalid: Order size must be smaller than or equal to your position size of {{size}} contracts for "Reduce Only" conditional orders
orderSize.reduce_size_invalid_existing_order_long: Order size must be smaller than or equal to {{newOrderSize}} contracts because you already have buy orders for {{existingOrderSize}} contracts with a position size of {{positionSize}} contracts
orderSize.reduce_size_invalid_existing_order_short: Order size must be smaller than or equal to {{newOrderSize}} contracts because you already have sell orders for {{existingOrderSize}} contracts with a position size of {{positionSize}} contracts
